alert.note: Alert for Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 5:10PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Pima County through 600 PM MST... At 509 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a couple strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Topawa, or 14 miles south of Sells, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sells, Topawa, San Isidro, Ali Chukson, Vamori, Cowlic, Fresnal, No:ligk, South Comobabi, Artesia, Itak and Ali Molina. This includes Route 86 between mile markers 106 and 131. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells
